title: Kaia Gerber embraces her edgy side as she leaves star-studded Beverly Hills bash
text:
She's been busy pursuing a career in modelling.

But Kaia Gerber set her worries aside Saturday night at a star-studded party in Beverly Hills.

The rising model, 18, looked super cool as she left Andrew Watt's birthday bash early Sunday morning in a black leather jacket, high waist jeans, and edgy ankle boots.

Party time: Kaia Gerber was spotted leaving a Beverly Hills party on Sunday morning

For her nighttime look, she opted for a black leather jacket and black top.

She had her signature high waisted jeans on that showed off her slender figure with the straight legged style and black boots.

Kaia rocked her new super short cut as she acted camera shy while waiting for her ride.

Casual: She kept her attire casual for the evening as she emerged from the party

A rising star in the world of modelling, Kaia has been following in the footsteps of her mother Cindy Crawford.

However, the young model never believed they looked anything alike until only recently.

'From day one, people in the industry were often taken aback by my resemblance to my mom,' she wrote in an essay for Vogue.

Stylish: For her nighttime look, she opted for a black leather jacket and black top

'As I get older, it happens even more, and it's not just a visual thing: It's everything from our mannerisms to our voices,' she continued in her own words to the magazine.

'It used to be that I didn't see it at all, but now I will look at a picture and have to take a moment before realizing which one of us it is.'

But she went on to reveal that the 'biggest compliment' of all is when someone says she 'acts like her mom.'

'Beyond her beauty and obvious appeal, she has always been my hero and my role model because of the way she treats people and the lens that she sees the world through, and that's something for which I'm beyond grateful.'
description: The rising model, 18, looked super cool as she left the mansion early Sunday morning in a black leather jacket, high waist jeans, and edgy ankle boots.
